data.name: Accurate
data.rule: Recast up to one failed Combat Stone for this attack.

data.name: Aggressive
data.rule: This model always gets a Combat Action if there are any enemy models within 3”.

data.name: Agile
data.rule: This model can re-roll a failed agility test.

data.name: Agility
data.rule: This model casts one additional Oran if it is the target of a Ranged Attack.

data.name: Alpha
data.rule: You may only have one model with the Alpha trait in a Force.

data.name: Ambush
data.rule: Do not deploy this model initially, but instead deploy a marker anywhere on the table. If there are any models within 6” of the marker at the start of a combat phase then immediately deploy this model so that its base covers the marker.

data.name: Aquatic
data.rule: The model may move cautiously through deep water, and can move through shallow water without moving cautiously.

data.name: Aromatherapy
data.rule: If the model is not engaged and has not moved this turn, every friendly model within command range gain one stamina. The stamina is lost immediately if the model moves out of command range.

data.name: Assassinate
data.rule: Fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model. Neither side may benefit from support.

data.name: Assistant
data.rule: This model is allocated a Master at the start of the game and will always activate for free when his Master is activated so long he is in his command range.

data.name: Authority
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Troops or Civilians. Any Troops activated by this model may immediately activate up to four friendly Troops, who may not use any further Leadership Abilities.

data.name: Beast Handler
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Beasts.

data.name: Blitz
data.rule: If this model casts [[X]] or more successful Erac in combat then you may immediately discard one of your opponent’s combat stones for the duration of the combat.

data.name: Bodyguard
data.rule: If an adjacent friendly Elite or Civilian model is about to take a Tough save, this model may make the save in their place. If it is failed then this model is removed as a casualty.

data.name: Bomb Carrier
data.rule: Any Frenu that begin their activation within this model's Command Range lose Weak [T] and gain the Charge (2)[A] ability for the duration of the activation.

data.name: Bushwack
data.rule: This model may make its Ranged Attack at any point during its move.

data.name: Cadre
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly models with the Cadre ability.

data.name: Captain
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Troops or Civilians.

data.name: Captor
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] adjacent enemy civilians.

data.name: Charge
data.rule: Fight a combat against an adjacent enemy immediately after this model has moved using its Basic Movement. This model may not benefit from support but casts [[X]] additional Combat Stones. This ability may not be used if this model had to Move Cautiously.

data.name: Combat Discipline
data.rule: Recast any or all Combat Stones.

data.name: Combat Trained
data.rule: Recast up to [[X]] failed Combat Stones. Can be used once per combat.

data.name: Commander
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly or allied Elites, Troops or Civilians.

data.name: Concealed
data.rule: This model may not be targeted by Ranged Attacks from more than 6” away.

data.name: Concentrated Fire
data.rule: Place a Target marker in Line of Sight at least 4” away from any friendly models. Any friendly Ranged Attacks against a model within 2” of the marker may recast one failed stone. Remove the Target marker at the end of the next Combat Phase.

data.name: Confuse
data.rule: Select a Beast model within this model’s Command Range. The model may not use any Combat or Activation Abilities for the rest of the turn.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.rule: Fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model. Both sides may benefit from support.

data.name: Coward
data.rule: If this model is forced to take a Tough save then it must immediately make an adjacent friendly model take the save on its behalf.

data.name: Creator
data.rule: This model receives [[X]] Automata at the start of the game. The Automata gain Loyalty [[Y]] [T].

data.name: Crew
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly models with the Crew ability.

data.name: Critical
data.rule: If this model is killed then the side with this model in cannot achieve a victory.

data.name: Critter
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly models with the Critter ability.

data.name: Defender
data.rule: If an adjacent friendly model becomes engaged during the Activation Phase then this model may immediately move to engage the enemy model, but must maintain contact with the friendly model at all times during the movement.

data.name: Defensive Line
data.rule: During any combat while adjacent to another friendly model with Defensive Line, if all successful casts are Oran then each success cancels two opposing Erac.

data.name: Defensive Stance
data.rule: Cast one additional Combat Stone if targeted by a Charge attack.

data.name: Diplomat
data.rule: These models may be taken as Allies in a force from the [[X]] Culture, accompanied by up to 100 points of friendly Troops and/or Elites. These models count as an Allies.

data.name: Dodge
data.rule: Force your opponent to turn over one successful Erac.

data.name: Evasive
data.rule: Each successful Oran cast by this model cancels two opposing Erac.

data.name: Explode
data.rule: If this model rolls a 1 on its Tough save, the bombs it was carrying all explode at once. Place a round template over the base: all models (partially) within it suffer a [[X]] CS ranged attack. No frenu can fetch bombs from this model from now on (ignore the model's Persistent trait if it had one).

data.name: Explodes
data.rule: Whenever a model picks up this object, and at the start of any turn where it is carrying it, it must make a 2+ tough save or be removed as a casualty.

data.name: Falconer
data.rule: This model is equipped with [[X]] falcons for free at the start of the game. Those models gain the Loyalty [T] ability for this model.

data.name: Favoured Allies
data.rule: This model allows you to take models of type [[X]] as allies. Those models and this model may treat each other as being friendly.

data.name: Feint
data.rule: Force your opponent to recast all their Combat Stones.

data.name: Ferocity
data.rule: Cast one additional Combat Stone.

data.name: Flit
data.rule: Use this model’s Combat Action to move up to 3”.

data.name: Flying
data.rule: This model may move over enemy models as long as it has sufficient movement. It may also move at full rate even if forced to Move Cautiously.

data.name: Focus
data.rule: Use before an attack. Cast an additional Combat Stone against all models targeted by this attack.

data.name: Fuel
data.rule: This model does not recover stamina during the End Phase.

data.name: Gasmask
data.rule: This model is immune to effects caused by cloud templates.

data.name: Get ’em!
data.rule: Select one friendly Beast model within this model’s Command Range to fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model. Both sides may benefit from support.

data.name: Good Fortune
data.rule: Allow a friendly model in command range to either recast a stone, or re-roll a die.

data.name: Graku Master
data.rule: This model may treat Graku as Troops.

data.name: Grishak Trainer
data.rule: At the start of the game, up to [[X]] Grishak in the force may be given the [[Y]] ability.

data.name: Skerrat Trainer
data.rule: At the start of the game, up to [[X]] Skerrat in the force may be given the [[Y]] ability.

data.name: Haphazard
data.rule:
Range 12”-24”. Place a target. Cast 4 CS and scatter the impact 2” from the target for each miss (roll a D6 to determine direction). Stamina can be used to recast stones. Place a 3” template on the impact point. All models under the template are hit with a Powerful 2CS range attack that ignores ’obstructed’. Leave the target in place, if the target for the next shot is within 3” of the target then you may recast one failed CS when rolling to scatter.
Alternate (Older) Version: At the start of each End phase both players roll one D6. If they roll a 5 or a 6 then they may place a shell anywhere on the table. The shell then scatters 2D6 in a random direction before exploding.
Models within 2” of the shell are hit with a 4 CS ranged attack and are Stunned until the start of the next End phase. Models within 4” are hit with a 2 CS ranged attack and are Stunned until the start of the next End phase. For all attacks use the position of the shell to determine if models are obstructed. Models closest to the shell are targeted first.

data.name: Heavy Vehicle
data.rule: This model may be moved up to 6” if pulled by 3 small models, 2 medium or 1 large model, or 3” if pulled by 2 small or 1 medium model.

data.name: Impetuous
data.rule: This model always activates when your first initiative counter is drawn each turn. This is in addition to other models you select to activate.

data.name: Indomitable
data.rule: This model does not lose its combat action if it is attacked.

data.name: Initiative
data.rule: If this model has not already activated and an adjacent friendly Elite or Civilian is activated this model may be activated for free.

data.name: Inspire
data.rule: All models directly activated by this model gain one stamina.

data.name: Instinctive
data.rule: This model always casts at least [[X]] Erac and [[Y]] Oran in combat.

data.name: Juicebar
data.rule: Any non-beast model that starts its activation adjacent to this model may gain one stamina but may only move cautiously this turn.

data.name: Leap
data.rule: Leap up to [[X]]”, ignoring intervening models. This move ignores the Move Cautiously rule.

data.name: Light Weapon
data.rule: This Ranged Ability may be used even if the model is engaged. The model does need to disengage (moving cautiously) first.

data.name: Long Range
data.rule: Increase the range of this attack by [[X]]”.

data.name: Loyalty
data.rule: Select a friendly [[X]] model in this force at the start of the game to be this model’s Master. While within its Master’s command range this model may be activated for free with the Master.

data.name: Lunge
data.rule: Use this model's combat action to attack a model within [[X]]”. These models count as adjacent for the duration of the combat. This may be used to attack through obstructing models.

data.name: Manipulate Swarm
data.rule:
Create, Grow or Disband [[X]] swarms within this model's Command Range.
  Create: Discard three Frenu and place a Small Swarm. The swarm must overlap the base of one of at least one of the three frenu. The swarm may not activate this turn.
  Disband: Discard a Small/Medium Swarm and place three/six Frenu.
  Grow: Discard a Small Swarm and three Frenu or two Small Swarms and place a Medium Swarm. The swarm must fully overlap the base of one of the small swarms; if necessary push the models in base contact away but ensure the relative positions remain unchanged. The swarm may not activate this turn.

data.name: Maternal
data.rule: Use before a Melee Combat. Cast one additional Combat Stone if there are any friendly Eggs within 12”.

data.name: Matriarch
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Jenta.

data.name: Mighty Blow
data.rule: Use before combat. Cast one less Combat Stone in combat. Any successful Erac require two Oran to be blocked.

data.name: Momentum
data.rule: Gain one stamina and move up to 2” if this model destroys another model.

data.name: Operated
data.rule: This model may be fired at the end of the turn if they did not move and there are least [[X]] unengaged friendly models adjacent to it.

data.name: Outcast
data.rule: This model may be not be used in a force that contains a Devanu Kopa or a Devanu Sempa.

data.name: Overdrive
data.rule: Use before combat. Cast one additional Combat Stone.

data.name: Pack
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly models with the Pack ability.

data.name: Pack Hunter
data.rule: This model provides one additional Combat Stone if supporting another model with Pack Hunter.

data.name: Pack Instinct
data.rule: Recast up to one failed Combat Stone for each model with Pack Instinct that is supporting.

data.name: Packmaster
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Elites.

data.name: Passive
data.rule: This model may not attack as a Combat Action.

data.name: Pathfinder
data.rule: At the start of the game you may choose not to deploy this model and up to [[X]] other small or medium models. You may use an Initiative Counter during the game to deploy these models as a single group at least 9” from any enemy models. The models may be activated during the turn.

data.name: Persistent
data.rule: Do not remove this model when disabled, the model continues to gain stamina.

data.name: Point Blank
data.rule: Cast an additional Combat Stone for the first target of this attack if it is caught Full Blast.

data.name: Pounce
data.rule: Use this model’s Combat Action to move up to [[X]]” and fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model.

data.name: Powerful
data.rule: Any blows that are landed by this model must be saved with a -1 modifier.

data.name: Powerful Charge
data.rule: If this model ends its move more than 4” from its starting position during its turn it gains Powerful until the end of the next Combat Phase. Blows landed by a model with the Powerful trait are saved with a -1 modifier.

data.name: Protected
data.rule: This model may be accompanied by up to [[X]] Rare models.

data.name: Proud
data.rule: This model may only be Activated Directly.

data.name: Quick Shot
data.rule: Make an additional Ranged Attack.

data.name: Ranger
data.rule: This model may move over difficult terrain without Moving Cautiously.

data.name: Rapid Strike
data.rule: Use this model’s Combat Action to fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model. Neither side may benefit from support.

data.name: Rare
data.rule: This model can only be taken to accompany a model with the Protected ability.

data.name: Refuel
data.rule: An adjacent model with the Fuel ability may immediately replenish up to [[X]] stamina.

data.name: Rescuer
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly civilians.

data.name: Retinue
data.rule: This model starts with one stamina if deployed within 3” of [[X]]. While within 3” of [[X]] this model gains one stamina during the End Phase.

data.name: Rider
data.rule: This model may be moved by a model with the Transport ability.

data.name: Sacrifice
data.rule: Discard a friendly model from within this model's command range to gain a stamina. This may be done at any time.

data.name: Safety Valve
data.rule: If this model has [[X]] Stamina when a combat stone is drawn then it immediately uses the Vent ability.

data.name: Savage
data.rule: If all successful casts are Erac then any blows landed on the enemy must be saved with a -1 modifier.

data.name: Sibling
data.rule: This model provides one additional Combat Stone if supporting another model with Sibling or Matriarch.

data.name: Smelling Salts
data.rule: Once per turn, a single friendly model in base contact with this model that fails its toughness save may re-roll it.

data.name: Solo
data.rule: If this model is Activated Directly then after it has activated you may return one of your Initiative Counters to the pool.

data.name: Blue
data.rule: Gain [[Y]] face-up [[X]] combat stone(s) when a blue combat stone is drawn from the bag.

data.name: Bomber
data.rule: If adjacent to a Bomb Carrier, Charge([[X]]) with Red/Green/Blue: Erac.

data.name: Caller
data.rule: This creature has the “Caller“ type.

data.name: Charge
data.rule: Fight a combat against an adjacent enemy immediately after this model has moved using its Basic Movement. This model may not benefit from support but casts [[X]] additional Combat Stones. This ability may not be used if this model had to Move Cautiously.

data.name: Concentrated Fire
data.rule: Place a Target marker in Line of Sight at least 4” away from any friendly models. Any friendly Ranged Attacks against a model within 2” of the marker may recast one failed stone. Remove the Target marker at the end of the next Combat Phase.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.rule: On your activation, move to engage the nearest unengaged player model. Then, after all other models in the force have moved, fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model. Both sides may benefit from support.

data.name: Create Swarm
data.rule: Discard 3 Frenu from within 6” and place a swarm adjacent to this model.

data.name: Defender
data.rule: If an adjacent friendly model becomes engaged during the Activation Phase then this model may immediately move to engage the enemy model, but must maintain contact with the friendly model at all times during the movement.

data.name: If Engaged: Detach
data.rule: If engaged, move 1” away from the engaging model(s).

data.name: Dodge
data.rule: Force your opponent to turn over one successful Erac.

data.name: Engage
data.rule: Move to engage the nearest unengaged player model.

data.name: Flying
data.rule: This model may move over enemy models as long as it has sufficient movement. It may also move at full rate even if forced to Move Cautiously.

data.name: Follow
data.rule: Aim to move to be [[X]]” away from the nearest player model.

data.name: Gang Up
data.rule: Move to engage the nearest player model.

data.name: Gather
data.rule: Move towards the nearest model of type “[[X]]”.

data.name: Green
data.rule: Gain [[Y]] face-up [[X]] combat stone(s) when a green combat stone is drawn from the bag.

data.name: If Engaged: Hold
data.rule: If engaged, don’t do anything.

data.name: Lunge
data.rule: Use this model's combat action to attack a model within [[X]]”. These models count as adjacent for the duration of the combat. This may be used to attack through obstructing models.

data.name: Pounce
data.rule: Use this model’s Combat Action to move up to [[X]]” and fight a combat against an adjacent enemy model.

data.name: Powerful
data.rule: Any blows that are landed by this model must be saved with a -1 modifier.

data.name: Ranged Attack
data.rule: Move to be [[X]]” away from the nearest unengaged player model and make a [[Y]] stone ranged attack.

data.name: Ranger
data.rule: This model may move over difficult terrain without Moving Cautiously.

data.name: Red
data.rule: Gain [[Y]] face-up [[X]] combat stone(s) when a red combat stone is drawn from the bag.

data.name: Sacrifice
data.rule: Before combat: discard one frenu within 3” to draw two additional stones. Combat response: discard any number of frenu within 3” to dodge blows.

data.name: Savage
data.rule: If all successful casts are Erac then any blows landed on the enemy must be saved with a -1 modifier.

data.name: Very Tough
data.rule: Re-roll a failed Tough save.

data.name: Spawn Frenu
data.rule: Place 1 frenu adjacent to the model. You can never have more frenu than you started with - spawned frenu must come from the 'dead pile'. Frenu that have joined Swarms should be kept separately.

data.name: Sprint
data.rule: Move up to [[X]]”. This ability may only be used after this model’s Basic Movement.

data.name: Stamina Limit
data.rule: This model may never use more than [[X]] stamina during one turn.

data.name: Standard
data.rule: Adjacent friendly models may use this model’s Command Range for their Leadership abilities and may activate twice as many models as usual.

data.name: Storm Summoner
data.rule: Place a 3” smoke template within this model’s command range.

data.name: Super Heavy Vehicle
data.rule: This model may be moved up to 6” if pulled by 2 large or 4 medium models, or 3” if pulled by 1 large or 2 medium models.

data.name: Swarm
data.rule: Activate up to [[X]] friendly Frenu.

data.name: Swift
data.rule: This model may be activated any number of times each turn.

data.name: Swim
data.rule: When in water, move up to [[X]]”

data.name: Tactician
data.rule: Use immediately after an Activation Counter has been drawn to return it to the bag and draw another counter. This ability costs two stamina to use.

data.name: Terrain
data.rule: After deploying this model you may immediately place [[X]] pieces of terrain of type [[Y]] within its command range. Note: as a general principle, “within” just means that some part of the model/template is within the area. “Completely within” means that it must be entirely within the area.

data.name: Trainer
data.rule: At the start of the game, up to [[X]] models in the force may be given the [[Y]] ability.

data.name: Transport
data.rule: Immediately after this model's Basic Movement, select up to [[X]] friendly or allied models with Rider that were contacted by this model during that movement. Place the Rider models adjacent to this model.

data.name: Travelling Biologist
data.rule: This model may be accompanied by up to [[X]] Beast models selected from any Culture or Theme by paying the usual points cost. The beasts count as Allies, but this model treats them as friendly.

data.name: Tune Up
data.rule: An adjacent Mechanical model may immediately gain one stamina.

data.name: Unstable
data.rule: Make a 2+ Tough save before each stamina is spent. If failed, this model Vents and is then removed as a casualty. All models under the cloud when it is placed are hit with a 2CS range attack. If this happens during a combat it ends immediately and no blows are landed by either side.

data.name: Unstoppable
data.rule: This model moves at full rate even if forced to Move Cautiously, and may move through small enemy models.

data.name: Untrained
data.rule: This model may not be Activated Directly.

data.name: Unwieldy
data.rule: A model may only carry one Unwieldy object. Small models Move Cautiously if carrying an Unwieldy object. A model carrying an Unwieldy object must pay an extra stamina before it uses a Stamina Ability. Huge models may ignore the Unwieldy trait.

data.name: Vehicle
data.rule: This model may carry up to [[X]] small friendly models as Crew.

data.name: Venerated
data.rule: If this model is killed then permanently discard one of this player’s Initiative Counters from the pool.

data.name: Vent
data.rule: Place a 3” cloud over the model. All models count as stunned while in the cloud. A stunned model loses one Combat and one Support and does not recover stamina.

data.name: Very Strong
data.rule: This model counts as a large model for pulling a Log Wagon or a Belderak.

data.name: Very Tough
data.rule: Re-roll a failed Tough save.

data.name: Weak
data.rule: Blows landed why this model are saved with a +1 modifier.

data.name: Well-Travelled
data.rule: This model treats all Allies as Friendly models.

data.name: Wide Spray
data.rule: Place an additional blast template adjacent to the first when selecting targets. Each model under the templates can be targeted once by this attack.

data.name: Whistle
data.rule: This model may double its Command Range when using Leadership abilities.

data.name: Wild Animal
data.rule: This model treats all models as enemies and will always use its Combat Action to initiate a combat with the nearest model.
